data.text: Check out the story about our beautiful flight attendant Lucine👩‍✈️ and her air diary in #Shanghai and #Chengdu . https://t.co/w8BOWgAeyq

This is the last flight carried out by Captain Shangguan. He has flown in the sky for 42 years, with a total flight time of more than 2,600 hours. Captain Shangguan flew every flight carefully and tried his best to take every passenger to their destination safely and comfortably. https://t.co/4l854dmZAq
@rowland_zhang Isn't it? Markus is a real sweetie. 😊

Building an “Air Bridge” between China and Hungary ! The 2nd China-CEEC Expo & International Consumer Goods Fair is coming soon in #Ningbo, #Zhejiang! Taking this chance, #CEAir opened a Ningbo-#Budapest direct cargo route, operating two flights a week. @InsightNingbo @InZhejiang https://t.co/py1OxfLgvV

data.text:
🌞Begin a good day with our new breakfast service! A new breakfast series of “Good Morning, #CEAir ” is about to launch from today. If U fly with us before 9 AM, you will love it. 
🧁🍔🌭Cheese & ham buns, red velvet cupcakes, matcha bread, burritos...all for U! #MUNews https://t.co/TwmpBjHTf9

data.text: "Successful connection!" Recently, China Eastern completed the EFB (electronic flight bags) access to the cockpit WiFi. #CEAir is one step closer to the application of EFB-cockpit interconnection. #MUNews https://t.co/IcBBFDPFYY
#CEAir provides a smoke-free cabin environment for our passengers. Let us protect the health of ourselves and those around us! #WorldNoTobaccoDay2021 https://t.co/PpRhxfJFWF

Let's take a look back at our journey during the #CEAirOpenDay trip. Check out the full version of the tour in #Shanghai. There are a lot more wonderful and exciting things about us hidden in the video. We can’t wait to share them with you. https://t.co/PFtcop8INP

data.text: Travel smart at #Chengdu Tianfu! #CEAir completed the 2nd rehearsal at Tianfu Airport recently. Facial recognition system was launched and smart flight information display terminals were equipped at our VIP lounge. We can provide you customized one-to-one service in the future. https://t.co/ngBXzfUTyL

The Great Wall, the Forbidden City, the Tea House…#Beijing is home to some of the country's best-known tourist attractions. Click on the video to unlock them and enjoy the beauty of Beijing with #CEAir. @BeijingFocus @BeijingDiscover @SpotlightBJ https://t.co/uQJXFkqT3l
Definitely a must-go place if you ever come to #Beijing 😎 https://t.co/YIiVVTHkSK

#Hungary we are coming! On May 26, the first cargo flight between #Ningbo and #Budapest took off. The flight carried electronic equipment, anti-epidemic materials, and will bring back exhibits for China-CEEC Expo. See you in Budapest! #MUNews #CEAir https://t.co/2KUrmKyAhB

data.text: #Beijing Daxing International Airport is known as one of the "seven wonders of the modern world". Fun #trivia here, the top roof of the airport is made up of more than 8000 pieces of intelligent sunshade glass. Would you like to see it? @DiscoverBeijing @SpotlightBJ @BeijingFocus https://t.co/wRMo2byLPH

Good morning! #CEAir is preparing for flight. China Eastern Airlines is the first airline in Asia to entirely equip electronic flight bags. Don't underestimate this small pad, it's a treasure for our pilots! https://t.co/uELlY6lAFG
China Eastern at your service. See you on board next time😘 https://t.co/ITHbmgE5UV

You are arriving at MU PLAZA and Shikumen. Let’s take a rest at this terminal of #CEAir’s tour.Both of the cozy places will relax yourself from a hard day at work. We will unlock the full version of #CEAirOpenDay video if this video hits 10,000 views. More clicks, more fun! https://t.co/cKPIJpLj2f

data.text: Continue to travel with Lucine on #CEAirOpenDay. You probably feel tired after two journeys, so we will relax right here at MU PLAZA! It is also one of #CEAir employees’ favorite places. Want to know what’s fun there? Check it out in the upcoming video. https://t.co/vtMghmKCtI
@zhangyue0622 Yep, you are right.

CEAir is honored to fly with the Chinese women's volleyball team. On May 21, China Eastern MU7115 carried 23 volleyball girls to Rome, #Italy for VNL tournament. CEAir prepared special food and beverages and provided high-quality services. #CEAir waits for your triumphant return! https://t.co/WBMpT9lfUH
@Louefurry @BeijingDiscover @SpotlightBJ @BeijingFocus Thank you for your comment😊
@BeijingDiscover 😛😛Ready for a try!

data.text: Let us show you how a local Beijinger tastes #Beijing Roast Duck! The meat slices are often served with spring onion, cucumber and sweet bean sauce with pancakes rolled around the fillings. You can choose side dishes to your liking! @BeijingDiscover @SpotlightBJ @BeijingFocus https://t.co/rWpKks4HnF

On May 22 09:34, carrying two critically injured people, China Eastern MU5733 transported them from earthquake zone to Kunming, #Yunnan . China Eastern quickly prepared for emergency disaster rescue. MU5733 is the 1st civil flight for injury transportation after the earthquake. https://t.co/xhZ9vIeEEy

A 6.4-magnitude earthquake hits Dali, #Yunnan on May 21. On May 22 01:11, China Eastern MU800, the 1st disaster rescue flight, carried a group of 29 earthquake relief team members to Dali. China Eastern responded immediately, sparing no effort to guarantee earthquake rescue work. https://t.co/qo7RIE513m

The world’s beauty comes from its diversity. May 22 is the #InternationalDayForBiologicalDiversity . Carbon emission reduction and endangered animal protection are measures CEAir has taken to turning slogans into actions. You are welcome to fly with us and explore. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/hU3I7WuQ4m
Check out #Shanghai through our Captain Diego's eyes😎 Don't miss it. https://t.co/z21emCju8i
@zhangyue0622 Thank you for your compliment🥰
Want to learn more about Grain Buds? Click here: https://t.co/jpMW4d5lut #24solarterms https://t.co/3qVvwrmY1m

Today is one of #24solarterms, Grain Buds (Xiaoman), when the seeds from grain start to become full, rivers full of water and ready to nourish the farmland. The concept of solar terms is wisdom from a thousand years ago and an important guidance to agriculture and daily life now. https://t.co/qwao8sIcna
@vannastranger So stay tuned for the next one😎😎
@Louefurry Thank you for your comment. We appreciate it😘
@lalalan50128877 Sure. Plz stay tuned for the next trip😘
@ayuan500 Isn' it?!🤟🤟
@RachelH42129049 Thank you for your comment. Please stay tuned for the next tour😘
@Louefurry Thank you for your comment. Lucine will be so happy for the compliment🤭

data.text: Today is #InternationalTeaDay. Tea drinking originated from China and is now popular around the world. The day makes more people understand and fall in love with #tea . What about a cup of MU TEA today！#MUTea #MUService https://t.co/TqAfBiTifw

Welcome to #CEAir Technology Application R&D Center! After this video tour, we guarantee that you will understand how these thousands of excellent CEAir crew members are produced. Hit 10,000 views and we will take you to MU Plaza and Shikumen, good places to relax. #CEAirOpenDay https://t.co/HU2dnTbUuF

Today we continue our tour with Lucine to experience the charm of CEAir. The second part of the tour has been unlocked! Follow the map, let’s take a look at the CEAir Technology Application R&D Center. The video will be out soon. Don't forget to check it out. #CEAirOpenDay https://t.co/DDyDsJyUZi
@zhangyue0622 Indeed, so romantic~ But sorry, it is just a beautiful village in Yunnan🤭🤭

data.text: Today, #TravelwithCEAir will show you the Water Cube. In preparation for the Winter Olympics #Beijing2022, the Water Cube has been renovated to "Ice Cube". You will be watching an exciting curling game here! @BeijingFocus @BeijingDiscover @BTV_beijing @SpotlightBJ https://t.co/n8hpz8oIbg

All CEAir planes are disinfected and cleaned thoroughly and punctually before boarding. Strict epidemic prevention and control measures are taken, so our passengers can travel with confidence. #MUService https://t.co/ANX8ed5CEY

data.text: Welcome to CEAir’s base in #Shanghai , also nicknamed the home of CEA employees. Want to know how #CEAir pilots and flight attendants prepare for flights? Check out the video. The next tour will be unlocked once this video hits 10,000 views. Please stay tuned. #CEAirOpenDay https://t.co/pIhC3OYPmm

Today continues #TravelwithCEAir to #Beijing ! Here is the location of the Forbidden City, which now houses the Palace Museum. Today is also #InternatinalMuseumDay, it’s a good time to learn something new! @touch_beijing  @BTV_beijing @BeijingFocus @BeijingDiscover @BeijingDaily https://t.co/Z2uiRa15hs

This year’s #CEAirOpenDay is about to start! Our beautiful French flight attendant Lucine will be your tour guide. Let's start the journey and visit the first stop, the MU City. Our first episode of the video will be released tomorrow morning, please stay tuned! https://t.co/2Cgno7eKYv

Travel safely! #CEAir tries its best to cover every detail. Checking every door in the cabin is one of our top missions to ensure the safety of all passengers. Now it's time for a guess. Can you figure out which plane model this is by just looking at the door? #MUService https://t.co/i3XOeWTIfX
No matter where you are, family is always the warmest harbor. Today is the #InternationalDayOfFamilies , CEAir will take you home. https://t.co/KI1VgRX6ge

This is the last winning work from our photo collection campaign. This photo was shot in Shuangjiang, Yunnan. The blooming flowers look like a color painting. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/ZrQ2xlGgHE

Here comes the second winning artwork of the photo collection campaign. The tea plantation in the photo is in Cangyuan, Yunnan. New tech, ideas and resources are brought to the county, while the tea flavor are spread across the world thru sky road. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/zh8K4yjL4J

Congratulations to the winners who contributed the three most LIKED photos. The first photo below shows the original beauty of Shangri-La. Under the blue sky and white clouds, the couple left their footprints across the prairie.#100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/nsg7ya9voy

#May I take you to a city which represents oriental architecture’s style the most？This time, #TravelwithCEAir will show you one of the most famous cities in China. Take a look at the GIF, can you figure out the city? https://t.co/JoSlDGVWrn
It's an honor to fight by your side. #InternationalNursesDay https://t.co/wijkhvihuo

“Welcome aboard, Sir. May I take your temperature?”
During the special time, CEAir crew take the temperature of every passenger before boarding. 
It is our mission to take all passengers to their destinations safe and sound. #MUService https://t.co/XusXsmal7V

“Baby darling, shall we put on a new mask?”
Previously, on the flight MU6369 from Shanghai to Yulin, a girl's mask was worn out. Seeing this, our flight attendant immediately offered a new one that the crew had prepared. Every passenger’s health is our top concern. #MUService https://t.co/Uz0AQZkCa4

“Folk Memories” is the last collection of our Beautiful Chinese Villages Photo Collection campaign. This part displays leisure activities organized in Chinese villages. You will be impressed if you have a chance to witness them. Vote for your fav ones. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/hbMeB9YWDx

data.text: She is a superwoman flying in the sky, and also a gentle caring mother on the earth. This day belongs to her. Don't forget to send your best wishes to your dear mother!#MothersDay #ladyPower https://t.co/4WuaitZ7u6

“Natural Scenery” is the forth collection of our Beautiful Chinese Villages Photo Collection campaign. This part shows natural sceneries in Chinese villages. Rivers, trees are well preserved. People live harmoniously with nature. Vote for your fav ones. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/GVt3I2uc1q

“True Villagers” is the third collection of our Beautiful Chinese Villages Photo Collection campaign. This part presents Chinese villagers and their lifestyles. Their smiling faces are a proof of an easygoing and satisfying life. Vote for your fav ones. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/Gidys2Vcgo

“Sweet Homes” is the second collection of our Beautiful Chinese Villages Photo Collection campaign. This part displays the typical Chinese countryside houses and buildings. BTW, do you think these are similar to where you live? Vote for your fav ones. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/gmRP2lolLa

Remember our Beautiful Chinese Villages Photo Collection campaign? We felt your passion! We made 5 videos with these photos. The first collection is named “Field Work”. Let’s follow the hard-working villagers and feel the earth. Vote for your fav ones. #100beautifulcountryroad https://t.co/zoZhKQMj6i
#24solarterms Want to know more about Start of Summer (Lixia)? Click here: https://t.co/vvm9ofCjhb https://t.co/czGOqmKw8g

Today is one of the 24 solar terms, Start of Summer (Lixia). The temperature will rise quickly during this period. Summer is a perfect time for traveling, are you ready to fly with China Eastern？#24solarterms https://t.co/0mfGVFXlWK

data.text:
Summertime is coming! CEAir will check expiry dates and control the temperature of all meals more carefully since the health and safety of our passengers is our top concern as always. 
#MUService #sharedeffortssharedfuture https://t.co/az9kBw5VQ9

Guys, any clue of the CEAir maintenance staff was doing below? 
He was doing HFEC inspection for a blocker door installed on GEnx-1B engine thrust reverser. Simply put, he was seeing if the engine had any damage. Taking U home safe is the starting point of our work. #MUService https://t.co/oFP5OtyiiW

We are so glad you chose CEAir. 
Hope you like our service. https://t.co/cr1db71plK
@HowardYu1 The same to you. Thanks you !

data.text: #ChinaEastern & China Railway introduced air-rail transport services to two more cities, #xian and #changsha. Since the service launching on Aug. 2020, passengers can book flight-and-train tickets through a single app for a more convenient journey and a better travel experience. https://t.co/QmLLHj69WA
Happy #WorkersDay to hardworking you! On this day, we'd like to thank every member of CEAir family for all their dedication and passion. https://t.co/hUSKAxVNAL
@Renboyu It is the latter.
@pilot7u5h Thanks
@ZhengguanNews Thanks for your praise. They are also very professional.
Hi, Antoine. So excited to see you again and very glad to know that our service made your day! https://t.co/IS5qB8gKoo

data.text: Protecting our shared environment is safeguarding our shared future. We will continue supporting ICAO's environment protection strategy. https://t.co/Oqoa9YZxCD
CEAir flight attendants dress-up show! #ladypower https://t.co/c6UiBwA6LC

In 2020, CEAir launched the “Ten Things for Employees” program and an O2O community platform called "Happy Family" to provide convenience for employees' lives and work. Employee care has always been the focus of CEAir. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/0wAQ6oEYVy

Surprise😲?
CEAir's flights could take you to Guiyang Longdongbao International Airport to find it out. 😁 https://t.co/qCg6BDykdj

data.text: In 2020, CEAir retrofitted over 1,000 ground vehicles, reducing particulate emissions by about 1,752 tons and nitrogen oxide emissions by about 50%. CEAir launched the first new energy boarding vehicle in China for passengers with reduced mobility. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/nLXQBhp6c9

The answer is Emergency Stop. 
Is this what you guessed.

Here comes another hand gesture quiz! Each hand gesture defines a specific signal. This staff member is crossing his lighting sticks. Do you know what he is trying to tell? #CEAirguess https://t.co/Ees6cgusy8
@ZhengguanNews Thanks for your attention.

In 2020, CEAir upgraded their "getting through airport by facial recognition" tech. The whole process took less than 20 mins. The luggage handling time is reduced from 8-10 mins to 3-5 mins, and the passenger satisfaction is increased by nearly 10%. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/1bAQyIWPkR

data.text:
In 2020, CEAir implemented “SAFE520 Safety at Work Code”. #CEAirInAction
S - Security
A - No Alcohol
F - Fasten seat belt
E - Equipment double checked
5 - 50℃ hot drinks without scalding accidents
2 - Two operators controlling the door
0 - Zero tolerance for hidden safety risk https://t.co/WjXfYpoKQE

data.text: Morning everyone! A fresh cup of orange juice could bring forth a wonderful day. CEAir is ready to serve you with it, are you ready for a brand-new day? #MUService https://t.co/mbYUvtophT

In 2020, CEAir non-profit service program “Love Relay” organized 2,364 non-profit activities, involving over 26,000 employees and contributing 295,300 hours of volunteer service . A great cause is always on CEAir’s agenda. #CEAirInAction https://t.co/BTJKwax0hl
Good morning! With a beautiful sunrise, let’s welcome a beautiful day with CEAir! #MUHelloThere https://t.co/TTwGSs1nwG
